issues.description: Column 'Unnamed: 0' deterministically maps to target 'Zurich Small Business'.
issues.suggested_fix: Drop the proxy feature or treat it as leakage.

issues.description: Timestamp columns are not strictly sorted; ensure TimeSeriesSplit or blocking is used to avoid look-ahead leakage.
issues.suggested_fix: Generate chronological folds via TimeSeriesSplit before training.
